Violations titleThese are violations that do not pose a direct threat to children but must be corrected within a month by the day care provider to assure the optimal functioning of the child care service Child care services are expected to correct all violations The Department of Health and Mental Hygiene does not perform compliance inspections to determine if violations were corrected when
